response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product truly stands out in its category, offering unparalleled performance and durability. Given its unique features and high standards, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, we're considering an exclusive offer of $200. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to own something special. Would you be interested in exploring this offer further?", "product_price": 200}
